message: Let's make a deal! I take $60, you take $40. A fair deal for a quick resolution, don't you think?
I think we can both do better. Let's split it 55/45, with me getting the larger share.  This ensures we both get a decent return, and avoids the risk of inflation eroding our gains in the next round.
Bob, time is money, and inflation is eating away at our potential gains. I'll take $55, you take $45.  This is better than what you offered last round, and waiting any longer will only hurt us both.
